help-file.title: CODER
help-file.content: Coders of the MUD are a series of self correcting algorithms, usually the process is started by a smaller script such as the "Alver", "Dvorak" or "Nokz" scripts. These work fine for most features but occasionally enter higher level functions and cause additional "features" which then need to pass through the "Tharkun" or "Ilienze" functions which restore the functions to their original code then rewrite them from scratch. The fabled Foo is a mostly unknown to Duris, but oddly his name is scratched to the bottom of each boat. If a Foo appears, most coder scripts will accept his function calls, except the "Kvark".
